text.0:
An email from the office of Nadine Dorries claimed that refusing a Covid vaccine will lead to personal restrictions.

The MP has since clarified that this isn't government policy, and the email was sent by a “new, young and very enthusiastic” staff member

https://t.co/64RlLwWa0e
text.1:
Just to re-confirm, the Magna Carta does not give justification for you to ignore Covid-19 regulations :backhand_index_pointing_down:

https://t.co/qPllDBNy5S https://t.co/FVO2DTUpBR
text.2:
Economic measures affect our lives in many ways.

But research we contributed to shows gaps in the public’s understanding of economic statistics; disillusionment and apathy.

Better communication is vital :backhand_index_pointing_down:

https://t.co/HFotYb3qGC
text.3:
A Spectator article suggests a new Danish study which found that mask-wearing didn’t lower Covid-19 infection rates is proof masks don’t work.

But the study didn’t look at whether masks help others.

https://t.co/6HnG761pMh
